Package net.minestom.server.command

Interface CommandSender

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PermissionHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleSender, FakePlayer, Player
    public interface CommandSender
extends PermissionHandler
    Represents something which can send commands to the server.

    Main implementations are Player and ConsoleSender.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default ConsoleSender asConsole()
      Casts this object to a ConsoleSender.
      default Player asPlayer()
      Casts this object to a Player.
      default boolean isConsole()
      Gets if the sender is a ConsoleSender.
      default boolean isPlayer()
      Gets if the sender is a Player.

      Sends a raw string message.
      default void sendMessage​(java.lang.String[] messages)
      Sends multiple raw string messages.
      default void sendMessage​(ColoredText text)

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage​(@NotNull
                 java.lang.String message)
        Sends a raw string message.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send

      • sendMessage

        default void sendMessage​(@NotNull
                         java.lang.String[] messages)
        Sends multiple raw string messages.
        Parameters:
        messages - the messages to send

      • sendMessage

        default void sendMessage​(@NotNull
                         ColoredText text)
        Sends a ColoredText message. If this is not a Player, only the content of the message will be sent as a string.
        Parameters:
        text - The ColoredText to send.

      • isPlayer

        default boolean isPlayer()
        Gets if the sender is a Player.
        Returns:
        true if 'this' is a player, false otherwise

      • isConsole

        default boolean isConsole()
        Gets if the sender is a ConsoleSender.
        Returns:
        true if 'this' is the console, false otherwise

      • asPlayer

        default Player asPlayer()
        Casts this object to a Player. No checks are performed, ClassCastException can very much happen.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if 'this' is not a player
        See Also:
        isPlayer()

      • asConsole

        default ConsoleSender asConsole()
        Casts this object to a ConsoleSender. No checks are performed, ClassCastException can very much happen.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if 'this' is not a console sender
        See Also:
        isConsole()
